mapper.insert: insert into groups (id, `name`, title, cover, privacy, posts, `time`, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privacy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{posts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update groups set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, privacy = #{privacy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, posts = #{posts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, title, cover, privacy, posts, `time`, description from groups
